items.title: Samsung’s 32-inch 4K M8 Smart Monitor with onboard webcam is M4 Mac mini ready at $310 off today
items.summary:
As part of its updated Samsung monitor sale, Woot is offering the brand’s 32-inch 4K M8 (M80D) Smart Monitor down at $389.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). Usually priced at $700, this 2024 model is now $310 off, bringing it down to one of the lowest prices we’ve tracked for it to date. We’ve seen it previously hit the $380 mark once directly at Samsung before being replaced by the newer M80F model, and today’s deal comes within just $10 of that all-time low. It remains a solid option for folks looking to buy a new monitor for their workstation without burning a huge hole in their wallet, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

items.title: Black Friday 2025 deal schedule: Best Buy, Amazon, Costco, LEGO, Walmart, more
items.summary:
The 2025 Black Friday deal season is upon us and early details from the major retailers are starting to flood in. This year we are already getting official confirmation from many of the biggest retailers and brands on when you can expect the Black Friday and Thanksgiving deals to begin and it looks like we are going to be getting a full month worth of big-time discounts in 2025. Deals are actually kicking off on October 31 this year and carrying right through to Thanksgiving 2025 and Black Friday with various sale events throughout the month of November. 

more…

items.title: VIOFO’s new A229 Ultra two and three-channel dash cams with first savings + FREE 256GB microSD starting from $340
items.summary:
Through the official VIOFO Amazon storefront, you can now pick up the brand’s latest A229 Ultra two and three-channel dash cams with their very first savings. You can score the VIOFO A229 Ultra Dual-Channel 4K Dash Cam at $339.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page coupon, while the VIOFO A229 Ultra Three-Channel 4K Dash Cam drops to $369.99 shipped, after clipping its on-page coupon. What’s more, both systems come with the added perk of getting a FREE 256GB microSD card too ($50 value)! You’d normally be spending $390 or $440 for these models at full price, with this being the first cash savings we’ve spotted since they released at the top of August. All-in-all, you’re getting $50 and $70 price cuts here, along with the FREE $50 microSD card, which sets the bar for future discounts down the road, officially putting its time keeping to its MSRP in the rearview mirror.

more…

items.summary:
Walmart wasted no time rolling out its 2025 Black Friday sale details now that Amazon, Best Buy, and more have made their official announcements. Just hours after revealing its lineup, Walmart is already offering a sneak peek at the deals you can score when the sale officially kicks off on November 14. These offers are expected to be part of Walmart’s first of three Black Friday and Cyber Monday events, featuring discounts of up to 75% on everything from LEGO sets and Apple gear to TVs and more. Keep reading for an early look at what’s on the way.

items.title: Get up to $1,116 early Black Friday savings on Tenways e-bike bundles starting from $1,499
items.summary:
Tenways has launched its Early Black Friday Sale, with up to $600 in savings on e-bikes alongside 50% off accessories, including the ongoing $1,116 savings on the AGO X All-Terrain Mid-Drive e-bike that gets a FREE Power Bank (range extender). Among the other deals we’re seeing, you can find Tenways’ CGO600 Pro Lightweight Commuter e-bike (both the chain and belt drives) with $118 in FREE add-on gear at $1,499 shipped – plus, you can add on a Power Bank (range extender) at 50% off on the page. Normally going for $1,899 in full, we’ve mostly been seeing the price taken down to $1,599 since March due to tariff hikes, with occasional falls lower to $1,499 for short timeframes. While we have seen it go lower in the past pre-tariff market, the deal here is a solid $400 price cut lending to a total $518 in savings ($672 if you add the Power Bank) that is the best price we’ve seen in our post-tariff market. You can also score an additional $150 off when buying two e-bikes together, with the usual medical provider, first responder, teacher, or military member discounts available too.

more…
